Text: In Hebrew and does not have .srt or sub file as far as I can tell please advise or post if you can.

no subtitle with this release.
but i have found one here:
http://subscene.com/english/For-My-Father-Sof-Shavua-BTel-Aviv/subtitle-266241.aspx

Simple storytelling but a very powerful film!  Thanks for this Bone...I never really enjoyed watching films in foreign language and with subtitles...but with this one...from the moment I've played it...I was hooked.  Thanks too "thebash" for providing the website where I was able to download the subtitle.
